title.zh: 漢興以來將相名臣年表
title.en: Chronicle of Generals, Chancellors, and Worthy Ministers since Han Founding

cells.translation: Gao Emperor first year

cells.content: 春，沛公為漢王，之南鄭。秋，還定雍。
cells.translation: Spring, Pei Gong became Han Wang, went to Nan Zheng. Autumn, returned pacified Yong.
1. Chancellor Xiao He guarded Han Zhong.
Imperial censor chief Zhou Ke guarded Xing Yang.

cells.content: 春，定塞、翟、魏、河南、韓、殷國。夏，伐項籍，至彭城。立太子。還據滎陽。
cells.translation: Spring, pacified Sai, Di, Wei, He Nan, Han, Yin states. Summer, attacked Xiang Ji, reached Peng Cheng. Established crown prince. Returned occupied Xing Yang.
2. Guarded Guan Zhong.
1. Grand commander Chang An Hou Lu Wan.

cells.content: 魏豹反。使韓信別定魏，伐趙。楚圍我滎陽。
cells.translation: Wei Bao rebelled. Sent Han Xin separately pacify Wei, attack Zhao. Chu surrounded our Xing Yang.

cells.content: 使韓信別定齊及燕，太公自楚歸，與楚界洪渠。
cells.translation: Sent Han Xin separately pacify Qi and Yan, Tai Gong from Chu returned, with Chu bordered Hong Qu.
3. Zhou Ke guarded Xing Yang, died.
Imperial censor chief Fen Yin Hou Zhou Chang.

cells.content: 冬，破楚垓下，殺項籍。春，王踐皇帝位定陶。。入都關中。
cells.translation: Winter, broke Chu Gai Xia, killed Xiang Ji. Spring, Wang ascended emperor position Ding Tao. Entered capital Guan Zhong.
5. Abolished grand commander office.
4. After nine months, Wan became Yan Wang.

cells.content: 尊太公為太上皇。劉仲為代王。立大市。更命咸陽曰長安。
cells.translation: Honored Tai Gong as Supreme Emperor. Liu Zhong as Dai Wang. Established great market. Changed named Xian Yang as Chang An.

cells.content: 六。封為酇侯。。張蒼為計相。
cells.translation: 6. Sealed as Tan Hou. Zhang Cang as calculation chancellor.

cells.content: 長樂宮成，自櫟陽徙長安。伐匈奴，匈奴圍我平城。
cells.translation: Chang Le Palace completed, from Que Yang moved Chang An. Attacked Xiong Nu, Xiong Nu surrounded our Ping Cheng.

cells.content: 擊韓信反虜於趙城。貫高作亂，明年覺，誅之。匈奴攻代王，代王棄國亡，廢為郃陽侯。
cells.translation: Struck Han Xin rebel captured at Zhao Cheng. Guan Gao made chaos, next year discovered, executed him. Xiong Nu attacked Dai Wang, Dai Wang abandoned state fled, deposed as He Yang Hou.

cells.content: 未央宮成，置酒前殿，太上皇輦上坐，帝奉玉卮上壽，曰：「始常以臣不如仲力，今臣功孰與仲多？」太上皇笑，殿上稱萬歲。徙齊田，楚昭、屈、景于關中。
cells.translation: Wei Chang Palace completed, set wine front hall, Supreme Emperor carriage upper sat, Emperor offered jade goblet longevity, said: 'Beginning often with minister not as Zhong strength, now minister merit who with Zhong many?' Supreme Emperor laughed, hall upper called ten thousand years. Moved Qi Tian, Chu Zhao, Qu, Jing to Guan Zhong.
9. Moved to chancellor state.
Imperial censor chief Chang as Zhao chancellor.
Supreme Emperor collapsed. Chen Xi rebelled in Dai territory.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Jiang Yi Hou Zhao Yao.
Executed Huai Yin, Peng Yue. Ying Bu rebelled.

cells.content: 周勃為太尉。攻代。後官省。
cells.translation: Zhou Bo became Grand Commandant. Attacked Dai. Later palaces reduced.

cells.content: 冬，擊布。還過沛。夏，上崩，葬長陵。
cells.translation: Winter, struck Bu. Returned passing Pei. Summer, emperor collapsed, buried at Chang Ling.
Xiao Hui first year

cells.content: 趙隱王如意死。始作長安城西北方。除諸侯丞相為相。
cells.translation: Zhao Yin Wang Ru Yi died. First built Chang An city northwest. Removed feudal lords' chancellors to chancellors.

cells.content: 楚元王、齊悼惠王來朝。七月辛未，何薨。
cells.translation: Chu Yuan Wang, Qi Dao Hui Wang came to court. Seventh month Xin Wei, He died.

cells.content: 十四。七月癸巳，齊相平陽侯曹參為相國。
cells.translation: Fourteen. Seventh month Gui Si, Qi chancellor Ping Yang Hou Cao Can became chancellor.

cells.content: 初作長安城。蜀湔氐反。擊之。
cells.translation: First built Chang An city. Shu Jian Di rebelled. Struck them.
Third month Jia Zi, amnesty, nothing to restore.

cells.content: 為高祖立廟於沛城成，置歌兒一百二十人。八月乙丑，參卒。
cells.translation: For Gao Zu established temple at Pei city walls, placed singing boys one hundred twenty people. Eighth month Yi Chou, Can died.

cells.content: 七月，齊悼惠王薨。立太倉、西市。
cells.translation: Seventh month, Qi Dao Hui Wang died. Established Grand Granary, Western Market.

cells.content: 一。十月己巳，安國侯王陵為右丞相。曲逆侯陳平為左丞相。
cells.translation: One. Tenth month Ji Si, An Guo Hou Wang Ling became right chancellor. Qu Ni Hou Chen Ping became left chancellor.
Yao committed crime.

cells.content: 廣阿侯任敖為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Guang E Hou Ren Ao became Imperial Secretary Grandee.

cells.content: 上崩。大臣用張辟彊計，呂氏權重，以呂台為呂王。立少帝。九月辛巳，葬安陵。
cells.translation: Emperor collapsed. Ministers used Zhang Pi Qiang's plan, Lu clan power heavy, made Lu Tai Lu Wang. Established Young Emperor. Ninth month Xin Si, buried at An Ling.
Gao Hou first year

cells.content: 王孝惠諸子。置孝悌力田。
cells.translation: Enfeoffed Xiao Hui's various sons. Established Xiao Ti Li Tian.

cells.content: 三。十一月甲子，徙平為右丞相。辟陽侯審食其為左丞相。
cells.translation: Three. Eleventh month Jia Zi, moved Ping to right chancellor. Pi Yang Hou Shen Shi Ji became left chancellor.

cells.content: 十二月，呂王台薨，子嘉代立為呂王。行八銖錢。
cells.translation: Twelfth month, Lu Wang Tai died, son Jia replaced as Lu Wang. Circulated eight zhu coins.
Four. Ping. Two. Shi Ji.

cells.content: 平陽侯曹窋為御史大夫。。
cells.translation: Ping Yang Hou Cao Tao became Imperial Secretary Grandee..
Five. Three

cells.content: 廢少帝，更立常山王弘為帝。
cells.translation: Deposed Young Emperor, changed established Chang Shan Wang Hong as emperor.
Six. Four. Established Grand Commandant office.
One. Jiang Hou Zhou Bo became Grand Commandant.

cells.content: 八月，淮陽王薨，以其弟壺關侯武為淮陽王。令戍卒歲更。
cells.translation: Eighth month, Huai Yang Wang died, with his younger brother Hu Guan Hou Wu became Huai Yang Wang. Commanded garrison troops yearly rotate.
Seven. Five

cells.content: 以呂產為呂王。四月丁酉，赦天下。晝昏。
cells.translation: Made Lu Chan Lu Wang. Fourth month Ding You, amnesty all under heaven. Day darkened.
Eight. Six

cells.content: 趙王幽死，以呂祿為趙王。梁王徙趙，自殺。
cells.translation: Zhao Wang You died, made Lu Lu Zhao Wang. Liang Wang moved to Zhao, suicide.
Nine. Seven

cells.content: 七月，高后崩。九月，誅諸呂。後九月，代王至，踐皇帝位。後九月，食其免相。
cells.translation: Seventh month, Gao Hou collapsed. Ninth month, executed various Lu. Later ninth month, Dai Wang arrived, ascended emperor position. Later ninth month, Shi Ji dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 十。七月辛巳，為帝太傅。九月壬戌，復為丞相。八
cells.translation: Ten. Seventh month Xin Si, became emperor Grand Tutor. Ninth month Ren Xu, again became chancellor. Eight

cells.content: 五。隆慮侯灶為將軍，擊南越。
cells.translation: Five. Long Lu Hou Zao became general, struck Nan Yue.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Cang.
Xiao Wen first year

cells.content: 除收孥相坐律。立太子。賜民爵。
cells.translation: Removed receiving nu mutually sitting law. Established crown prince. Granted people ranks.

cells.content: 十一。十一月辛巳，平徙為左丞相。太尉絳侯周勃為右丞相。
cells.translation: Eleven. Eleventh month Xin Si, Ping moved to left chancellor. Grand Commandant Jiang Hou Zhou Bo became right chancellor.

cells.content: 六。勃為相，潁陰侯灌嬰為太尉。
cells.translation: Six. Bo became chancellor, Ying Yin Hou Guan Ying became Grand Commandant.

cells.content: 除誹謗律。皇子武為代王，參為太原王，揖為梁王。十月，丞相平薨。
cells.translation: Removed defamation law. Imperial son Wu became Dai Wang, Shen became Tai Yuan Wang, Yi became Liang Wang. Tenth month, chancellor Ping died.

cells.content: 一。十一月乙亥，絳侯勃復為丞相。
cells.translation: One. Eleventh month Yi Hai, Jiang Hou Bo again became chancellor.

cells.content: 徙代王武為淮陽王。上幸太原。濟北王反。匈奴大入上郡。以地盡與太原，太原更號代。十一月壬子，勃免相，之國。
cells.translation: Moved Dai Wang Wu to Huai Yang Wang. Emperor visited Tai Yuan. Ji Bei Wang rebelled. Xiongnu greatly entered Shang Jun. Gave land all to Tai Yuan, Tai Yuan changed name Dai. Eleventh month Ren Zi, Bo dismissed chancellor, went to fief.

cells.content: 一。十二月乙亥，太尉潁陰侯灌嬰為丞相。罷太尉官。
cells.translation: One. Twelfth month Yi Hai, Grand Commandant Ying Yin Hou Guan Ying became chancellor. Abolished Grand Commandant office.

cells.content: 二。棘蒲侯陳武為大將軍，擊濟北。昌侯盧卿、共侯盧罷師、甯侯鸱、深澤侯將夜皆為將軍，屬武祁侯賀，將兵屯滎陽。
cells.translation: Two. Ji Pu Hou Chen Wu became Grand General, struck Ji Bei. Chang Hou Lu Qing, Gong Hou Lu Ba Shi, Ning Hou Chi, Shen Ze Hou Jiang Ye all became generals, belonged to Wu Qi Hou He, led troops garrisoned Xing Yang.
Twelfth month Ji Si, Ying died.

cells.content: 一。正月甲午，御史大夫北平侯張蒼為丞相。
cells.translation: One. First month Jia Wu, Imperial Secretary Grandee Bei Ping Hou Zhang Cang became chancellor.

cells.content: 安丘侯張說為將軍，擊胡，出代。
cells.translation: An Qiu Hou Zhang Yue became general, struck Hu, went out Dai.

cells.content: 關中侯申屠嘉為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Guan Zhong Hou Shen Tu Jia became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Removed coin law, people could cast coins

cells.content: 廢淮南王，遷嚴道，道死雍。
cells.translation: Deposed Huai Nan Wang, moved Yan Dao, died on road at Yong.
Fourth month Bing Zi, first established Nan Ling.
Grand Usher Ru Yin Hou Teng Gong died.

cells.content: 溫室鐘自鳴。以芷陽鄉為霸陵。
cells.translation: Wen Shi bell self-rang. Made Zhi Yang xiang into Ba Ling.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Jing.
Feudal lords all arrived at Chang An.
Emperor visited Dai. Earth shook.

cells.content: 河決東郡金隄。徙淮陽王為梁王。
cells.translation: River burst Dong Jun Jin Di. Moved Huai Yang Wang to Liang Wang.

cells.content: 除肉刑及田租稅律、戍卒令。
cells.translation: Removed corporal punishment and field tax law, garrison troops command.

cells.content: 匈奴大入蕭關，發兵擊之，及屯長安旁。
cells.translation: Xiongnu greatly entered Xiao Guan, sent troops struck them, also garrisoned beside Chang An.

cells.content: 成侯董赤、內史欒布、昌侯盧卿、隆慮侯灶、甯侯鸱皆為將軍，東陽侯張相如為大將軍，皆擊匈奴。中尉周舍、郎中令張武皆為將軍，屯長安旁。
cells.translation: Cheng Hou Dong Chi, Interior Li Luan Bu, Chang Hou Lu Qing, Long Lu Hou Zao, Ning Hou Chi all became generals, Dong Yang Hou Zhang Xiang Ru became Grand General, all struck Xiongnu. Commandant Zhou She, Lang Zhong Ling Zhang Wu all became generals, garrisoned beside Chang An.

cells.content: 黃龍見成紀。上始郊見雍五帝。
cells.translation: Yellow dragon appeared at Cheng Ji. Emperor first suburbanly saw Yong five emperors.
Emperor first suburbanly saw Wei Yang five emperors.
Later first year

cells.content: 新垣平詐言方士，覺，誅之。
cells.translation: Xin Yuan Ping falsely spoke of fang shi, aware, executed him.

cells.content: 匈奴和親。地動。八月戊辰，蒼免相。
cells.translation: Third month, earth shook. Southwest Yi rebelled.

cells.content: 十五。八月庚午，御史大夫申屠嘉為丞相，封故安侯。
cells.translation: Fifteenth month. Eighth month Geng Wu, Imperial Secretary Grandee Shen Tu Jia became chancellor, enfeoffed Gu An Hou.
Fifth month, earth shook.
Sixth month, earth shook.
Qi Xuan Gong Jiu Za first year

cells.content: 匈奴三萬人入上郡，二萬人入雲中。
cells.translation: Four. Divided Fan, Zhong Xing land with Zhi Bo.

cells.content: 以中大夫令免為車騎將軍，軍飛狐，故楚相蘇意為將軍，軍句注；。將軍張武屯北地；河內守周亞夫為將軍，軍細柳；宗正劉禮軍霸上；祝茲侯徐厲軍棘門：以備胡。數月，胡去，亦罷。
cells.translation: Used Interior Grandee Ling Mian as Chariot Cavalry General, army Fei Hu, former Chu chancellor Su Yi as general, army Gou Zhu; general Zhang Wu garrisoned Bei Di; He Nei governor Zhou Ya Fu as general, army Xi Liu; Zong Zheng Liu Li army Ba Shang; Zhu Zi Hou Xu Li army Ji Men: to prepare for Hu. Several months, Hu withdrew, also abolished.

cells.content: 六月己亥，孝文皇帝崩。丁未，太子立。民出臨三日，葬霸陵。
cells.translation: Sixth month Ji Hai, Xiao Wen emperor collapsed. Ding Wei, crown prince established. People went out to mourn three days, buried at Ba Ling.

cells.content: 中尉亞夫為車騎將軍，郎中令張武為復土將軍，屬國捍為將屯將軍。詹事戎奴為車騎將軍，侍太后。
cells.translation: Commandant Ya Fu as Chariot Cavalry General, Lang Zhong Ling Zhang Wu as Restore Earth General, Shu Guo Han as Garrison General. Jian Shi Rong Nu as Chariot Cavalry General, served Tai Hou.
Xiao Jing first year

cells.content: 立孝文皇帝廟，郡國為太宗廟。
cells.translation: Established Xiao Wen emperor temple, jun guo as Tai Zong temple.
Seven. Established Si Tu office.

cells.content: 立皇子德為河閒王，閼為臨江王，餘為淮陽王，非為汝南王，彭祖為廣川王，發為長沙王。四月中，孝文太后崩。嘉卒。
cells.translation: Established imperial son De as He Xian Wang, Yan as Lin Jiang Wang, Yu as Huai Yang Wang, Fei as Ru Nan Wang, Peng Zu as Guang Chuan Wang, Fa as Chang Sha Wang. Fourth month middle, Xiao Wen Tai Hou collapsed. Jia died.
Eight. Kai Feng Hou Tao Qing became chancellor.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Cuo.

cells.content: 吳楚七國反，發兵擊，皆破之。皇子端為膠西王，勝為中山王。
cells.translation: Wu Chu seven states rebelled, sent troops struck, all broke them. Imperial son Duan became Jiao Xi Wang, Sheng became Zhong Shan Wang.
Two. Established Grand Commandant office.

cells.content: 中尉條侯周亞夫。為太尉，擊吳楚；曲周侯酈寄為將軍，擊趙；竇嬰為大將軍，屯滎陽，欒布為將軍，擊齊。
cells.translation: Commandant Tiao Hou Zhou Ya Fu. Became Grand Commandant, struck Wu Chu; Qu Zhou Hou Li Ji became general, struck Zhao; Dou Ying became Grand General, garrisoned Xing Yang, Luan Bu became general, struck Qi.
Established crown prince.
Two. Grand Commandant Ya Fu.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Fen.

cells.content: 置陽陵邑。丞相北平侯張蒼卒。
cells.translation: Established Yang Ling yi. Chancellor Bei Ping Hou Zhang Cang died.
Moved Guang Chuan Wang Peng Zu to Zhao Wang.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Yang Ling Hou Cen Mai.

cells.content: 廢太子榮為臨江王。四月丁巳，膠東王立為太子。青罷相。
cells.translation: Deposed crown prince Rong as Lin Jiang Wang. Fourth month Ding Si, Jiao Dong Wang established as crown prince. Qing dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 六月乙巳，太尉條侯亞夫為丞相。罷太尉官。
cells.translation: Sixth month Yi Si, Grand Commandant Tiao Hou Ya Fu became chancellor. Abolished Grand Commandant office.
Five. Promoted became chancellor.
Imperial Secretary Grandee She.
Middle first year

cells.content: 皇子越為廣川王，寄為膠東王。
cells.translation: Imperial son Yue became Guang Chuan Wang, Ji became Jiao Dong Wang.

cells.content: 皇子乘為清河王。亞夫免相。
cells.translation: Imperial son Cheng became Qing He Wang. Ya Fu dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 四。御史大夫桃侯劉舍為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Imperial Secretary Grandee Tao Hou Liu She became chancellor.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Wan.

cells.content: 臨江王徵，自殺，葬藍田，燕數萬為銜士置冢上。
cells.translation: Lin Jiang Wang Zheng, suicide, buried at Lan Tian, Yan several ten thousand as bitter soldiers placed on tomb.
Imperial son Shun became Chang Shan Wang.

cells.content: 梁孝王武薨。分梁為五國，王諸子：子買為梁王，明為濟川王，彭離為濟東王，定為山陽王，不識為濟陰王。
cells.translation: Liang Xiao Wang Wu died. Divided Liang into five states, enfeoffed various sons: Zi Mai became Liang Wang, Ming became Ji Chuan Wang, Peng Li became Ji Dong Wang, Ding became Shan Yang Wang, Bu Shi became Ji Yin Wang.
Later first year

cells.content: 五月，地動。七月乙巳，日蝕。舍免相。
cells.translation: Fifth month, earth shook. Seventh month Yi Si, solar eclipse. Dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 五。八月壬辰，御史大夫建陵侯衛綰為丞相。
cells.translation: Five. Eighth month Ren Chen, Imperial Secretary Grandee Jian Ling Hou Wei Wan became chancellor.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Bu Yi.

cells.content: 六月丁丑，御史大夫岑邁卒。
cells.translation: Sixth month Ding Chou, Imperial Secretary Grandee Cen Mai died.

cells.content: 正月甲子，孝景皇帝崩。二月丙子，太子立。
cells.translation: First month Jia Zi, Xiao Jing emperor collapsed. Second month Bing Zi, crown prince established.
Xiao Wu Jian Yuan first year
Wan dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 四。魏其侯竇嬰為丞相。置太尉。
cells.translation: Four. Wei Qi Hou Dou Ying became chancellor. Established Grand Commandant.
Wu An Hou Tian Fen became Grand Commandant.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Di.
Established Mao Ling. Ying dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 二月乙未，太常柏至侯許昌為丞相。蚡免太尉。罷太尉官。
cells.translation: Second month Yi Wei, Grand Usher Bai Zhi Hou Xu Chang became chancellor. Fen dismissed Grand Commandant. Abolished Grand Commandant office.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Zhao Wan.

cells.content: 東甌王廣武侯望率其眾四萬餘人來降，處廬江郡。
cells.translation: Dong Ou Wang Guang Wu Hou Wang led his multitude forty thousand plus people came to surrender, placed in Lu Jiang jun.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Qing Di.
Circulated three divided coins.

cells.content: 正月，閩越王反。孝景太后崩。。昌免相。
cells.translation: First month, Min Yue Wang rebelled. Xiao Jing Tai Hou collapsed.. Chang dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 五。六月癸巳，武安侯田蚡為丞相。
cells.translation: Five. Sixth month Gui Si, Wu An Hou Tian Fen became chancellor.
Qing Di became crown prince Grand Tutor.
Imperial Secretary Grandee An Guo.
Yuan Guang first year
Emperor first went to Yong, suburbanly saw five zhi.

cells.content: 夏，御史大夫韓安國為護軍將軍，衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，大行王恢為將屯將軍，太中大夫李息為材官將軍，篡單于馬邑，不合，誅恢。
cells.translation: Summer, Imperial Secretary Grandee Han An Guo became Protector General, Wei Wei Li Guang became Brave Cavalry General, Grand Usher Gong Sun He became Light Chariot General, Grand Herald Wang Hui became General Garrison General, Grand Master Li Xi became Timber Officer General, trapped Chan Yu at Mai Yi, not successful, executed Hui.
Fifth month Bing Zi, river burst at Hu Zi.
Twelfth month Ding Hai, earth shook. Fen died.
Five. Ping Ji Hou Xue Ze became chancellor.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Ou.

cells.content: 十月，族灌夫家，棄魏其侯市。
cells.translation: Tenth month, exterminated Guan Fu family, executed Wei Qi Hou in market.
Southern Yi first established postal stations.

cells.content: 太中大夫衛青為車騎將軍，出上谷；衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，出鴈門；大中大夫公孫敖為騎將軍，出代；太僕公孫賀為輕車將軍，出雲中：皆擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Grand Master Wei Qing became Chariot Cavalry General, went out Shang Gu; Wei Wei Li Guang became Brave Cavalry General, went out Yan Men; Grand Master Gong Sun Ao became Cavalry General, went out Dai; Grand Usher Gong Sun He became Light Chariot General, went out Yun Zhong: all struck Xiongnu.
Yuan Shuo first year
Wei lady established as empress.

cells.content: 車騎將軍青出雁門，擊匈奴。衛尉韓安國為將屯將軍，軍代，明年，屯漁陽卒。
cells.translation: Chariot Cavalry General Qing went out Yan Men, struck Xiongnu. Wei Wei Han An Guo became General Garrison General, army Dai, next year, garrison Yu Yang died.

cells.content: 春，車騎將軍衛青出雲中，至高闕，取河南地。
cells.translation: Spring, Chariot Cavalry General Wei Qing went out Yun Zhong, reached Gao Que, took He Nan land.
Xiongnu killed Dai Grand Administrator You.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Hong.
Xiongnu entered Ding Xiang, Dai, Shang Jun.

cells.content: 匈奴殺代都尉朱英。澤免相。
cells.translation: Xiongnu killed Dai Colonel Vuheng Zhu Ying. Ze dismissed chancellor.

cells.content: 八。十一月乙丑，御史大夫公孫弘為丞相，封平津侯。
cells.translation: Eight. Eleventh month Yi Chou, Imperial Secretary Grandee Gong Sun Hong became chancellor, enfeoffed Ping Jin Hou.

cells.content: 春，長平侯衛青為大將軍，擊右賢。衛尉蘇建為游擊將軍，屬青。左內史李沮為強弩將軍，太僕賀為車騎將軍，代相李蔡為輕車將軍，岸頭侯張次公為將軍，大行息為將軍：皆屬大將軍，擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Spring, Chang Ping Hou Wei Qing became Grand General, struck You Xian. Wei Wei Su Jian became Roaming Strike General, belonged to Qing. Left Interior Li Ju became Strong Crossbow General, Grand Usher He became Chariot Cavalry General, Dai chancellor Li Cai became Light Chariot General, An Tou Hou Zhang Ci Gong became general, Grand Herald Xi became general: all belonged to Grand General, struck Xiongnu.

cells.content: 大將軍青再出定襄擊胡。合騎侯公孫敖為中將軍，太僕賀為左將軍，郎中令李廣為後將軍。翕侯趙信為前將軍，敗降匈奴。衛尉蘇建為右將軍，敗，身脫。左內史沮為彊弩將軍。皆屬青。
cells.translation: Grand General Qing again went out Ding Xiang struck Hu. He Qi Hou Gong Sun Ao became Middle General, Grand Usher He became Left General, Lang Zhong Ling Li Guang became Rear General. Xi Hou Zhao Xin became Front General, defeated surrendered Xiongnu. Wei Wei Su Jian became Right General, defeated, body escaped. Left Interior Ju became Strong Crossbow General. All belonged to Qing.
Yuan Shou first year

cells.content: 十��中，淮南王安、衡山王賜謀反，皆自殺，國除。
cells.translation: Tenth month, Huai Nan Wang An, Heng Shan Wang Ci plotted rebellion, all suicide, states eliminated.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Cai.

cells.content: 匈奴入鴈門、代郡。江都王建反。膠東王子慶立為六安王。弘卒。
cells.translation: Xiongnu entered Yan Men, Dai jun. Jiang Du Wang Jian rebelled. Jiao Dong prince Qing established as Liu An Wang. Hong died.

cells.content: 四。御史大夫樂安侯李蔡為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Imperial Secretary Grandee Yue An Hou Li Cai became chancellor.

cells.content: 冠軍侯霍去病為驃騎將軍，擊胡，至祁連；合騎侯敖為將軍。出北地；博望侯張騫、郎中令李廣為將軍，出右北平。
cells.translation: Champion Hou Huo Qu Bing became Brave Cavalry General, struck Hu, reached Qi Lian; Combined Cavalry Hou Ao became general. Went out Bei Di; Bo Wang Hou Zhang Qian, Lang Zhong Ling Li Guang became generals, went out You Bei Ping.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Tang.
Xiongnu entered You Bei Ping, Ding Xiang.

cells.content: 大將軍青出定襄，郎中令李廣為前將軍，太僕公孫賀為左將軍，主爵趙食其為右將軍，平陽侯曹襄為後將軍：擊單于。
cells.translation: Grand General Qing went out Ding Xiang, Lang Zhong Ling Li Guang became Front General, Grand Usher Gong Sun He became Left General, Lord of Fiefdom Zhao Shi Ji became Right General, Ping Yang Hou Cao Xiang became Rear General: struck Chan Yu.
Cai sat invading garden wall, suicide.

cells.content: 四。太子少傅武彊侯莊青翟為丞相。
cells.translation: Four. Crown prince Junior Tutor Wu Qiang Hou Zhuang Qing Di became chancellor.

cells.content: 四月乙巳，皇子閎為齊王，旦為燕王，胥為廣陵王。
cells.translation: Fourth month Yi Si, imperial son Hong became Qi Wang, Dan became Yan Wang, Xu became Guang Ling Wang.
Sixth month, amnesty.
Qing Di had crime, suicide.

cells.content: 四。太子太傅高陵侯趙周為丞相。
cells.translation: Wei Dao Gong Wei first year.
Thirty-three. Xiang Zi died.
Qin Ling Gong first year. Gave birth to Xian Gong.

cells.content: 立常山憲王子平為真定王，商為泗水王。六月中，河東汾陰得寶鼎。
cells.translation: Established Chang Shan Xian Wang Zi Ping as Zhen Ding Wang, Shang as Si Shui Wang. Sixth month middle, He Dong Fen Yin got precious ding.

cells.content: 三月中，南越相嘉反，殺其王及漢使者。八月，周坐酎金，自殺。
cells.translation: Third month middle, Nan Yue chancellor Jia rebelled, assassinated their wang and Han envoy. Eighth month, Zhou sat on brewing gold, suicide.

cells.content: 四。九月辛巳，御史大夫石慶為丞相，封牧丘侯。
cells.translation: Four. Ninth month Xin Si, Imperial Secretary Grandee Shi Qing became chancellor, enfeoffed Mu Qiu Hou.

cells.content: 衛尉路博德為伏波將軍，出桂陽；主爵楊僕為樓船將軍，出豫章：皆破南越。
cells.translation: Wei Wei Lu Bo De became Fu Bo General, went out Gui Yang; Lord of Fiefdom Yang Pu became Lou Ship General, went out Yu Zhang: all broke Nan Yue.
Five. Wei assassinated Jin You Gong, established his younger brother Zhi.

cells.content: 故龍镪侯韓說為橫海將軍，出會稽；樓船將軍楊僕出豫章；中尉王溫舒出會稽：皆破東越。
cells.translation: Former Long Bang Hou Han Yue became Heng Hai General, went out Hui Ji; Lou Ship General Yang Pu went out Yu Zhang; Commandant Wang Wen Shu went out Hui Ji: all broke Dong Yue.
Seven. Fought with Wei at Shao Liang.
Yuan Feng first year.
Eight. County established Pu, Lan Tian, Shan Ming Shi.

cells.content: 秋，樓船將軍楊僕、左將軍荀彘出遼東，擊朝鮮。
cells.translation: Autumn, Lou Ship General Yang Pu, Left General Xun Zhi went out Liao Dong, struck Chao Xian.
Tai Chu first year
Qin Jian Gong first year
Eight. Built moat He river bank. First used jun lord wife river.

cells.content: 十。三月丁卯，太僕公孫賀為丞相，封葛繹侯。
cells.translation: Ten. Third month Ding Mao, Grand Usher Gong Sun He became chancellor, enfeoffed Ge Yi Hou.
Eleven. Shu chancellor assassinated Shu Hou.
Twelve. Southwest Yi rebelled, sent troops struck them.
Thirteenth month, amnesty.
Fourteenth month, amnesty.

cells.content: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，至余吾水上；游擊將軍韓說出五原；因杅將軍公孫敖：皆擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Spring, Er Shi General Li Guang Li went out Shuo Fang, reached Yu Wu Shui; Roaming Strike General Han Yue went out Wu Yuan; Yin Zhu General Gong Sun Ao: all struck Xiongnu.
Sixteenth month, amnesty.
Seventeenth month, amnesty.
Eighteenth month, amnesty.
Winter, He sat as gu died.

cells.content: 七月壬午，太子發兵，殺游擊將軍說、使者江充。
cells.translation: Seventh month Ren Wu, crown prince sent troops, killed Roaming Strike General Yue, envoy Jiang Chong.

cells.content: 三月丁巳，涿郡太守劉屈氂為丞相，封彭城侯。
cells.translation: Third month Ding Si, Zhuo jun Grand Administrator Liu Qu Mi became chancellor, enfeoffed Peng Cheng Hou.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Cheng.
Sixth month, Liu Qu Mi because gu beheaded.

cells.content: 春，貳師將軍李廣利出朔方，以兵降胡。重合侯莽通出酒泉，御史大夫商丘成出河西，擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Spring, Er Shi General Li Guang Li went out Shuo Fang, with troops surrendered to Hu. Chong He Hou Mang Tong went out Jiu Quan, Imperial Secretary Grandee Shang Qiu Cheng went out He Xi, struck Xiongnu.

cells.content: 六月丁巳，大鴻臚田千秋為丞相，封富民侯。
cells.translation: Sixth month Ding Si, Grand Hong Lu Tian Qian Qiu became chancellor, enfeoffed Fu Min Hou.
Later Yuan first year

cells.content: 二月己巳，光祿大夫霍光為大將軍，博陸侯；都尉金日磾為車騎將軍，秺侯；太僕安陽侯上官舛為大將軍。
cells.translation: Second month Ji Si, Guang Lu Grandee Huo Guang became Grand General, Bo Lu Hou; Colonel Jin Ri Di became Chariot Cavalry General, An Hou; Grand Usher An Yang Hou Shang Quan Mi became Grand General.
Xiao Zhao Shi Yuan first year
Four. Ninth month, Ri Di died.

cells.content: 三月癸酉，衛尉王莽為左將軍，騎都尉上官安為車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Third month Gui You, Wei Wei Wang Mang became Left General, Cavalry Colonel Shang Quan An became Chariot Cavalry General.
Yuan Feng first year

cells.content: 九月庚午，光祿勳張安世為右將軍。
cells.translation: Ninth month Geng Wu, Guang Lu Xun Zhang An Shi became Right General.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Xin.

cells.content: 十二月庚寅，中郎將范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
cells.translation: Twelfth month Geng Yin, Palace Attendant General Fan Ming You became Du Liao General, struck Wu Wan.
Third month Jia Xu, Qian Qiu died.

cells.content: 三月乙丑，御史大夫王訢為丞相，封富春侯。
cells.translation: Third month Yi Chou, Imperial Secretary Grandee Wang Xin became chancellor, enfeoffed Fu Chun Hou.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Yang Chang.
Twelfth month Geng Xu, Xin died.

cells.content: 十一月乙丑，御史大夫楊敞為丞相，封安平侯。
cells.translation: Eleventh month Yi Chou, Imperial Secretary Grandee Yang Chang became chancellor, enfeoffed An Ping Hou.

cells.content: 九月庚寅，衛尉平陵侯范明友為度遼將軍，擊烏丸。
cells.translation: Ninth month Geng Yin, Wei Wei Ping Ling Hou Fan Ming You became Du Liao General, struck Wu Wan.
Yuan Ping first year
Chang died.

cells.content: 九月戊戌，御史大夫蔡義為丞相，封陽平侯。
cells.translation: Ninth month Wu Xu, Imperial Secretary Grandee Cai Yi became chancellor, enfeoffed Yang Ping Hou.

cells.content: 四月甲申，光祿大夫龍镪侯韓曾為前將軍。五月丁酉，水衡都尉趙充國為後將軍，右將軍張安世為車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Fourth month Jia Shen, Guang Lu Grandee Long Bang Hou Han Zeng became Front General. Fifth month Ding You, Water Balance Colonel Zhao Chong Guo became Rear General, Right General Zhang An Shi became Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 御史大夫昌水侯田廣明。
cells.translation: Imperial Secretary Grandee Chang Shui Hou Tian Guang Ming.
Xiao Xuan Ben Shi first year

cells.content: 七月庚寅，御史大夫田廣明為祁連將軍，龍镪侯韓曾為後將軍，營平侯趙充國為蒲類將軍，度遼將軍平陵侯范明友為雲中太守，富民侯田順為虎牙將軍：皆擊匈奴。
cells.translation: Seventh month Geng Yin, Imperial Secretary Grandee Tian Guang Ming became Qi Lian General, Long Bang Hou Han Zeng became Rear General, Ying Ping Hou Zhao Chong Guo became Pu Lei General, Du Liao General Ping Ling Hou Fan Ming You became Yun Zhong Grand Administrator, Fu Min Hou Tian Shun became Hu Ya General: all struck Xiongnu.

cells.content: 三月戊子，皇后崩。六月乙丑，義薨。
cells.translation: Third month Wu Zi, empress collapsed. Sixth month Yi Chou, Yi died.

cells.content: 六月甲辰，長信少府韋賢為丞相，封扶陽侯。田廣明、田順擊胡還，皆自殺。充國奪將軍印。
cells.translation: Sixth month Jia Chen, Chang Xin Shao Fu Wei Xian became chancellor, enfeoffed Fu Yang Hou. Tian Guang Ming, Tian Shun struck Hu returned, all suicide. Chong Guo deprived general seal.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Wei Xiang.
Tenth month Yi Mao, established Huo empress.
Di Jie first year
Four. Third month Geng Wu, General Guang died.

cells.content: 二月丁卯，侍中、中郎將霍禹為右將軍。
cells.translation: Second month Ding Mao, Attendant, Palace Attendant General Huo Yu became Right General.

cells.content: 立太子。五月甲申，賢老，賜金百斤。
cells.translation: Established crown prince. Fifth month Jia Shen, Xian old, granted gold one hundred jin.

cells.content: 六月壬辰，御史大夫魏相為丞相，封高平侯。
cells.translation: Sixth month Ren Chen, Imperial Secretary Grandee Wei Xiang became chancellor, enfeoffed Gao Ping Hou.

cells.content: 七月，安世為大司馬、衛將軍。禹為大司馬。
cells.translation: Seventh month, An Shi became Grand Commandant, Wei General. Yu became Grand Commandant.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Bing Ji.
Two. Seventh month Ren Yin, Yu waist beheaded.
Yuan Kang first year
Six. Eighth month Bing Yin, An Shi died.
Shen Jue first year

cells.content: 上郊甘泉太畤、汾陰后土。
cells.translation: Emperor suburban Gan Quan Tai Zhi, Fen Yin Hou Tu.

cells.content: 四月，樂成侯許延壽為強弩將軍。後將軍充國擊羌。酒泉太守辛武賢為破羌將軍。韓曾為大司馬、車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Fourth month, Yue Cheng Hou Xu Yan Shou became Strong Crossbow General. Rear General Chong Guo struck Qiang. Jiu Quan Grand Administrator Xin Wu Xian became Break Qiang General. Han Zeng became Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 上郊雍五畤。祋祤出寶璧玉器。
cells.translation: Emperor suburban Yong five zhi. Sacrificial altar produced precious jade bi jade vessels.
Third month, Xiang died.

cells.content: 四月戊戌，御史大夫邴吉為丞相，封博陽侯。
cells.translation: Fourth month Wu Xu, Imperial Secretary Grandee Bing Ji became chancellor, enfeoffed Bo Yang Hou.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Wang Zhi.
Wu Feng first year
Four. Fifth month Ji Chou, Zeng died.

cells.content: 五月，延壽為大司馬、車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Fifth month, Yan Shou became Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Ba.
First month, Ji died.

cells.content: 三月壬申，御史大夫黃霸為丞相，封建成侯。
cells.translation: Third month Ren Shen, Imperial Secretary Grandee Huang Ba became chancellor, enfeoffed Jian Cheng Hou.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Yan Nian.
Gan Lu first year
Three. Third month Ding Wei, Yan Shou died.

cells.content: 赦殊死，賜高年及鰥寡孤獨帛，女子牛酒。
cells.translation: Amnesty special death, granted high age and widowers widows orphans silk, women cattle wine.
Imperial Secretary Grandee Ding Guo.
Third month Ji Chou, Ba died.

cells.content: 七月丁巳，御史大夫于定國為丞相，封西平侯。
cells.translation: Seventh month Ding Si, Imperial Secretary Grandee Yu Ding Guo became chancellor, enfeoffed Xi Ping Hou.

cells.content: 太僕陳萬年為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Grand Usher Chen Wan Nian became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Huang Long first year

cells.content: 樂陵侯史子長為大司馬、車騎將軍。太子太傅蕭望之為前將軍。
cells.translation: Yue Ling Hou Shi Zi Chang became Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General. Crown Prince Grand Tutor Xiao Wang Zhi became Front General.
Xiao Yuan Chu Yuan first year

cells.content: 十二月，執金吾馮奉世為右將軍。
cells.translation: Twelfth month, Executive Gold Wu Feng Feng Shi became Right General.

cells.content: 二月丁巳，平恩侯許嘉為左將軍。
cells.translation: Second month Ding Si, Ping En Hou Xu Jia became Left General.

cells.content: 中少府貢禹為御史大夫。十二月丁未，長信少府薛廣德為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Middle Junior Treasurer Gong Yu became Imperial Secretary Grandee. Twelfth month Ding Wei, Chang Xin Junior Treasurer Xue Guang De became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Yong Guang first year
Tenth month Wu Yin, Ding Guo dismissed.
Nine. Seventh month, Zi Chang dismissed, went to residence.

cells.content: 九月，衛尉平昌侯王接為大司馬、車騎將軍。二月，廣德免。
cells.translation: Ninth month, Wei Wei Ping Chang Hou Wang Jie became Grand Commandant, Chariot Cavalry General. Second month, Guang De dismissed.

cells.content: 七月，太子太傅韋玄成為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Seventh month, Crown Prince Grand Tutor Wei Xuan Cheng became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Third month Ren Xu first day, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 二月丁酉，御史大夫韋玄成為丞相，封扶陽侯。丞相賢子。
cells.translation: Second month Ding You, Imperial Secretary Grandee Wei Xuan Cheng became chancellor, enfeoffed Fu Yang Hou. Chancellor Xian son.

cells.content: 七月，太常任千秋為奮武將軍，擊西羌；雲中太守韓次君為建威將軍，擊羌。後不行。
cells.translation: Seventh month, Grand Usher Ren Qian Qiu became Fen Wu General, struck Xi Qiang; Yun Zhong Grand Administrator Han Ci Jun became Jian Wei General, struck Qiang. Later not went.

cells.content: 二月丁酉，右扶風鄭弘為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Second month Ding You, Right Fu Feng Zheng Hong became Imperial Secretary Grandee.

cells.content: 右將軍平恩侯許嘉為車騎將軍，侍中、光祿大夫樂昌侯王商為右將軍，右將軍馮奉世為左將軍。
cells.translation: Right General Ping En Hou Xu Jia became Chariot Cavalry General, Attendant, Guang Lu Grandee Yue Chang Hou Wang Shang became Right General, Right General Feng Feng Shi became Left General.
Jian Zhao first year
Hong dismissed.

cells.content: 光祿勳匡衡為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Guang Lu Xun Kuang Heng became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Sixth month Jia Chen, Xuan Cheng died.

cells.content: 七月癸亥，御史大夫匡衡為丞相，封樂安侯。
cells.translation: Seventh month Gui Hai, Imperial Secretary Grandee Kuang Heng became chancellor, enfeoffed Yue An Hou.

cells.content: 衛尉繁延壽為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Wei Wei Fan Yan Shou became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Jing Ning first year

cells.content: 六月己未，衛尉楊平侯王鳳為大司馬、大將軍。延壽卒。
cells.translation: Sixth month Ji Wei, Wei Wei Yang Ping Hou Wang Feng became Grand Commandant, Grand General. Yan Shou died.

cells.content: 三月丙寅，太子少傅張譚為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Third month Bing Yin, Crown Prince Junior Tutor Zhang Tan became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
Xiao Cheng Jian Shi first year
Twelfth month Ding Chou, Heng dismissed.

cells.content: 七。八月癸丑，遣光祿勳詔嘉上印綬免，賜金二百斤。
cells.translation: Seven. Eighth month Gui Chou, sent Guang Lu Xun Zhao Jia return seal cords dismissed, granted gold two hundred jin.

cells.content: 十月，右將軍樂昌侯王商為光祿大夫、右將軍，執金吾弋陽侯任千秋為右將軍。譚免。
cells.translation: Tenth month, Right General Yue Chang Hou Wang Shang became Guang Lu Grandee, Right General, Executive Gold Wu Yi Yang Hou Ren Qian Qiu became Right General. Tan dismissed.
Court Judge Yin Zhong became Imperial Secretary Grandee.

cells.content: 三月甲申，右將軍樂昌侯王商為右丞相。
cells.translation: Third month Jia Shen, Right General Yue Chang Hou Wang Shang became Right Chancellor.

cells.content: 任千秋為左將軍，長樂衛尉史丹為右將軍。十月己亥，尹忠自剌殺。
cells.translation: Ren Qian Qiu became Left General, Chang Yue Wei Wei Shi Dan became Right General. Tenth month Ji Hai, Yin Zhong self-stabbed killed.
Junior Treasurer Zhang Zhong became Imperial Secretary Grandee.
He Ping first year

cells.content: 十月辛卯，史丹為左將軍，太僕平安侯王章為右將軍。
cells.translation: Tenth month Xin Mao, Shi Dan became Left General, Grand Usher Ping An Hou Wang Zhang became Right General.
Fourth month Ren Yin, Chancellor Shang dismissed.

cells.content: 六月丙午，諸吏散騎光祿大夫張禹為丞相。
cells.translation: Sixth month Bing Wu, various officials Scattered Cavalry Guang Lu Grandee Zhang Yu became chancellor.
Yang Shuo first year
Zhang Zhong died.

cells.content: 六月，太僕王音為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Sixth month, Grand Usher Wang Yin became Imperial Secretary Grandee.

cells.content: 九月甲子，御史大夫王音為車騎將軍。
cells.translation: Ninth month Jia Zi, Imperial Secretary Grandee Wang Yin became Chariot Cavalry General.

cells.content: 十月乙卯，光祿勳于永為御史大夫。
cells.translation: Tenth month Yi Mao, Guang Lu Xun Yu Yong became Imperial Secretary Grandee.

cells.content: 七月乙丑，右將軍光祿勳平安侯王章卒。
cells.translation: Seventh month Yi Chou, Right General Guang Lu Xun Ping An Hou Wang Zhang died.
Intercalary month Ren Xu, Yong died.
Hong Jia first year
Third month, Yu died.
Fourth month Geng Chen, Xue Xuan became chancellor.
